item.title: My CV
Disclaimer
item.description: Any views posted on this site are my own and do not necessarily reflect those of my employer or any other person. Whilst I have made reasonable attempt to make sure the information presented is accurate, it is not guaranteed. Any links to external sites provided are the property of the respective owners. Whilst this Blog references Hashicorp Terraform and Microsoft Azure extensively, anything posted here does not represent either company.
